Ecommerce Application - Inventory Service

controllers package

Submodules

controllers.inventory_controller module

controllers.inventory_controller.add_goods_route()[source]

Add new goods to the inventory.

Request:

JSON object containing the details of the goods to be added.

Returns:

A success message with the added goods’ details, or an error message on failure.

Return type:

Response

controllers.inventory_controller.deduct_goods_route(item_id)[source]

Deduct a specific quantity of goods from the inventory.

Parameters:

item_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item to deduct goods from.

Request:

JSON object containing the quantity to deduct (count).

Returns:

A success message with the updated goods’ details, or an error message on failure.

Return type:

Response

controllers.inventory_controller.get_all()[source]

Retrieve all inventory items.

Returns:

A JSON list of all inventory items.

Return type:

Response

controllers.inventory_controller.health_check()[source]

Check the health status of the inventory service.

Returns:

A JSON object with the service health status, database connection status, and uptime.

Return type:

Response

controllers.inventory_controller.update_goods_route(item_id)[source]

Update the details of an inventory item.

Parameters:

item_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item to update.

Request:

JSON object containing the fields to update.

Returns:

A success message with the updated goods’ details, or an error message on failure.

Return type:

Response
